verbose_text: Furthermore, the antioxidant NAC and Amlx -- a TBK1 kinase inhibitor - block mitophagic flux and lysosome enlargement, suggesting that oxidative stress and the phosphorylation of the mitophagic adaptors Optn and p62 / SQSTM1 by TBK1 may play a role in mitophagic flux in RPE cells under diabetic conditions.
evidence: phosphorylation of the mitophagic adaptors Optn
